name: <blink>
description:
You find yourself in an angular 2D world where you are the only being able to break into the 3rd dimension, giving you the ability to “teleport” between places by simply leaping. This has angered the authorities, and is considered the greatest offence.

You were sentenced to death and now await in a cell for your execution. The security is tight and there are gun turrets everywhere, but they forgot one thing: you can jump out of the cell with almost no effort.

Now you have to escape the prison...

This game prototype was made as the final delivery of the course TPD4168 at NTNU, by Lars Grytten and Agata Jedryszek.
